Html: I know I've seen it working before, but I'm running 2.2.13 with a Warlock profile loaded. On Slot: Direct Upgrades, I see a bunch of items, but no relative value bars.  Is this currently broken?  The Upgrades doesn't have the ability to filter on source of the upgrades, so it's a bit more cumbersome to use.

(Sidenote, the upgrades DOES have the ability to filter on source; you just do it before running the upgrade list)

Fixed this for v2.2.14.
